short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add rectangles to the h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6 tags on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension has a button. If user click the button all heading (h1-h6) element tags in the current page will be framed with a red border rectangle and placed a badge at the right bottom corner which includes h1-h6 text in it. 
Also user can see the list of header elements on the page left top corner in a box. 
This feature intend to help developers see all heading tags on published and running pages.
